alert.note: Alert for Cochise (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 11 at 11:22PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Southeast Arizona, including the following county, Cochise. * WHEN...Until 115 AM MST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1119 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated between 1.00 and 1.50 inches of rain have fallen. This will cause small stream flooding, especially along and near the Gadwell Canyon Wash. Rainfall runoff may impact portions of Davis Road. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of South Central Cochise County - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
